programme.desc: The pressures of fame have superstar singer Noni on the edge until she meets Kaz, a young cop who works to help her find the courage to develop her own voice and break free to become the artist she was meant to be.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Calvin, who inherited a struggling barbershop, views the shop as nothing but a burden and a waste of his time. After selling the shop to a local loan shark, Calvin slowly begins to see his father's vision and legacy.

programme.title: The Motherhood
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Series. With support from The Motherhood, Tasha rediscovers her confidence as a woman.

programme.title: The Good Witch's Garden
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Good witch Cassie Nightingale has finally found a home at stately Grey House.

programme.title: The Good Witch's Gift
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Cassie is surprised when Jake proposes their wedding date for Christmas Eve.

programme.title: The Lost Valentine
programme.desc: Hallmark Hall of Fame. Susan is covering story of Caroline, who has waited 60 years for her husband.

programme.title: Sister Wife Murder
programme.desc: Chloe attends church for the first time and becomes enamored with her pastor, Caleb. She falls in love with him, only to discover that he is married to two women and that she is entering a toxic and dangerous relationship.

programme.title: The Plot to Kill My Mother
programme.desc: A woman who unknowingly grew up under federal witness protection starts to question everything after her mother's murder. She decides to leave the program and find her mom's killer before he strikes again.

programme.title: Revenge for My Mother
programme.desc: Audrey teaches postnatal fitness to a group of moms who bring their baby strollers to the park, but when her recently hired assistant secretly starts exacting revenge, Audrey's perfect world erupts into madness.

programme.title: Sister Wife Murder
programme.desc: Chloe attends church for the first time and becomes enamored with her pastor, Caleb. She falls in love with him, only to discover that he is married to two women and that she is entering a toxic and dangerous relationship.

programme.title: The Hurt Locker
programme.desc: Staff Sgt. William James (Jeremy Renner), Sgt. J.T. Sanborn (Anthony Mackie) and Specialist Owen Eldridge (Brian Geraghty) are members of a bomb-disposal unit in Baghdad. As their tour of duty enters its final weeks, the men face a set of increasingly hazardous situations, any of which could end their lives in an explosive instant.

programme.title: The Contractor
programme.desc: Involuntarily discharged from the Army, a special forces sergeant lands a contract with a private underground military force. When his very first assignment goes awry, the elite soldier finds himself hunted and on the run, caught in a dangerous conspiracy and fighting to stay alive long enough to get home and uncover the true motives of those who betrayed him.

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: An estranged family finds redemption in the unlikeliest of places: the MMA ring. Tommy (Tom Hardy), an ex-Marine with a tragic past, returns home and enlists his father (Nick Nolte), a recovering alcoholic and former wrestling coach, to train him for "Sparta," the biggest MMA tournament ever held. But when Tommy's underdog brother, Brendan (Joel Edgerton), fights his way into the tournament, the two brothers must finally confront each other and the forces that pulled them apart.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: As ‘The Chosen One', Murphy's on a madcap mission to save The Golden Child, a youth with mystical powers who's been abducted by an evil cult.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal
programme.desc: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

programme.title: Push
programme.desc: Superhumans defy a government plot to harness and abuse their powers. Chris Evans and Dakota Fanning (the TWILIGHT films) team in a pulse-pounding paranormal thriller.

programme.title: Young Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: When a plague of bizarre, puzzling murders grip London, young Holmes and his new found friend Watson find themselves unwittingly entangled in the dark mystery.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Two years after he and his Autobot friends saved the Earth from the Decepticons, Sam Witwicky (Shia LaBeouf) faces a new battle: college. Meanwhile, Optimus Prime and the Autobots are working with a secret military organization and trying to make a home for themselves on Earth. When an ancient Decepticon known as The Fallen rises up to wreak vengeance, Sam and his girlfriend, Mikaela, must figure out the history of the Transformers on Earth and find a way to defeat The Fallen once and for all.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Sam Witwicky (Shia LaBeouf) and his new girlfriend, Carly (Rosie Huntington-Whiteley), join the fray when the evil Decepticons renew their longstanding war against the Autobots. Optimus Prime (Peter Cullen) believes that resurrecting ancient Transformer Sentinel Prime (Leonard Nimoy), once the leader of the Autobots, may lead to victory. That decision, however, has devastating consequences the war appears to tip in favor of the Decepticons, leading to a climactic battle in Chicago.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: After an epic battle, a great city lies in ruins, but the Earth itself is saved. As humanity begins to pick up the pieces, a shadowy group emerges to try to take control of history. Meanwhile, an ancient and powerful new menace sets its sights on Earth. A new group of humans, led by Cade Yeager (Mark Wahlberg), helps Optimus Prime (Peter Cullen) and the Autobots rise up to meet their most fearsome challenge yet: a worldwide war of good versus evil.

programme.title: Blonde Ambition
programme.desc: A young professional (Jessica Simpson) becomes the unwitting pawn in a plot by two executives to take over a company.

programme.title: Race the Sun
programme.desc: Sandra (Halle Berry), the new science teacher at a poor Hawaiian high school, finds the students surly and unmotivated. So she handpicks eight of them, including artistic Daniel (Casey Affleck) and his hedonistic stepsister, Cindy (Eliza Dushku), and guides them in the design and construction of a solar-powered car. After their unorthodox vehicle wins the Hawaiian championship, they travel to Australia to compete in a dangerous 2000-mile trek across the outback.

programme.title: Just One of the Guys
programme.desc: When Terry Griffith (Joyce Hyser) loses her high school's writing competition, she's convinced that it's because she's a girl. So Terry decides to change high schools and pose as a boy to prove her point. Her brother, Buddy (Billy Jacoby), helps her pass as a guy so well that she is soon making friends with the boys at school, including the attractive Rick (Clayton Rohner), who becomes her new best friend. But her gender-swapping makes things difficult when she falls in love with him.

programme.title: Whatever It Takes
programme.desc: A nerdy teen, Ryan Woodman (Shane West) is smitten with the popular and gorgeous Ashley Grant (Jodi Lyn O'Keefe), who apparently has no interest in him. Meanwhile, dim star athlete Chris Campbell (James Franco) has his eye on Ryan's brainy and beautiful friend, Maggie Carter (Marla Sokoloff). The two agree to help each other in their romantic quests, but, as they come closer to their goals, both Ryan and Chris suspect that they might be pursuing the wrong girls.

programme.title: The Magic Carpet
programme.desc: When his parents, the caliph and queen, are murdered by usurper Ali (Gregory Gaye), the newborn Ramoth is delivered to the safety of his uncle, Ahkmid (William Fawcett), via a magic carpet. The adult Ramoth (John Agar) becomes masked hero the Scarlet Falcon. After tricking the reigning caliph into appointing him the royal physician, Ramoth learns of his noble birth and, with the help of faithful Razi (George Tobias) and beautiful Lida (Patricia Medina), he fights Ali and his wrathful minions.

programme.title: Holiday
programme.desc: Johnny (Cary Grant) seems like a solid match for Julia (Doris Nolan), the socialite daughter of Edward Seton (Henry Kolker). Assured that Johnny is a worthy suitor, Edward approves of the pairing. But, as Johnny's wanderlust surfaces -- he is more interested in traveling than in business -- Edward starts to have doubts. Johnny also begins to wonder if he might not be a better match for Linda (Katharine Hepburn), Julia's outspoken younger sister, with whom he has much more in common.

programme.title: Under the Yum Yum Tree
programme.desc: Libidinous Hogan (Jack Lemmon) is a landlord who prefers to rent his rooms to attractive single females. Hogan is instantly smitten with a pretty new tenant named Robin (Carol Lynley), but realizes that he'll have to contend with Robin's boyfriend, David (Dean Jones), if he's to attain the object of his desire. He gets his opportunity when he learns that the couple's living arrangement is a pre-marital experiment to see if they would be compatible as partners when sex is out of the equation.

programme.title: Only Angels Have Wings
programme.desc: Rough and tough Geoff Carter (Cary Grant) runs a tiny airline that cannot afford to miss any flights, despite the dangers along many of the routes. When Bonnie Lee (Jean Arthur), a performer who is falling for him, sees that Geoff is preparing to fly in violent weather conditions, she takes measures to make him stay. She's successful in her attempt, and two of his employees are forced to make the flight for him -- but Bonnie may have been correct about the potential peril of that flight.

programme.title: Dear God
programme.desc: Special delivery for comedy fans! Greg Kinnear stars in and Garry Marshall directs this spirit-lifter about a money-scamming con artist who goes from no-good to doing good.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Steve Martin plays Reverend Jonas Nightengale, a slick-asoil flimflam man who'll trade salvation for a donation to his touring ministry. Jonas knows how to work a crowd and a con, but his works of wonder are done with mirrors and smoke.

programme.title: Big Top Pee-Wee
programme.desc: In Big Top Pee-Wee, I live on a country farm where I feed my barnyard animals pancake breakfasts and work on top-secret botanical experiments with my pet pig, Vance.

programme.title: Shes Having a Baby
programme.desc: Last year at this time, Jake and Kristi were two crazy single kids in love. Now they're two crazy married adults in transition.

programme.title: The Jackal
programme.desc: During an FBI raid on a Moscow nightclub, the brother of Russian gangster Terek Murad (David Hayman) is killed. Murad wants revenge and hires anonymous hit man the Jackal (Bruce Willis) to kill FBI Deputy Director Carter Preston (Sidney Poitier). With the help of Russian agent Valentina Koslova (Diane Venora), Preston finds the only man who knows what the notorious Jackal looks like, imprisoned IRA terrorist Declan Mulqueen (Richard Gere), and forces him to help hunt down the hit man.

programme.title: The Truth About Charlie
programme.desc: Regina (Thandie Newton) meets charming Joshua (Mark Wahlberg) while vacationing in Martinique, as she contemplates ending her whirlwind marriage to enigmatic Charlie (Stephen Dillane). Then upon her return to Paris, she finds that both her apartment and her bank account have been emptied, and her husband has been murdered. The more Reggie learns, the more she realizes the scope of the puzzle, which she must solve to protect herself from ever-increasing danger.

programme.title: Breach
programme.desc: Eric O'Neill (Ryan Phillippe), a low-level surveillance expert with the FBI, believes he is accomplishing his dream of becoming a full-fledged agent, with his unexpected promotion and assignment to work with renowned agent Robert Hanssen (Chris Cooper). However, he soon learns the reason for his promotion is to gain Hanssen's trust and find proof that he is a traitor to the country.

programme.title: Columbus Circle
programme.desc: After living as a shut-in for two decades, an heiress must confront her fears when detectives arrive to investigate the murder of her neighbor.

programme.title: Santa Girl
programme.desc: Santa Claus� only daughter wants to experience the �real world� before she must marry the son of Jack Frost and take over the family business. Cassie Claus sets off to college while trying to keep her famous father a secret.

programme.title: Already Tomorrow in Hong Kong
programme.desc: Ruby (Jamie Chung) and Josh (Bryan Greenberg) spent an unforgettable night together in Hong Kong a year ago, and now their brief encounter is about to get a second chance.

programme.title: 12 Days of Christmas
programme.desc: During their first winter break from college, two childhood friends navigate turbulent reunions, unspoken romances, and even an unplanned pregnancy.

programme.title: The Christmas Kid
programme.desc: A take on Home Alone British style where the main character is all grown up now.

programme.title: My Dad's Christmas Date
programme.desc: A 16-year-old tries to play matchmaker for her widowed father during Christmastime.

programme.title: Our Take on Love
programme.desc: Designer Isabella and filmmaker Blake plan a big celebration in a mansion with a famous love story.

programme.title: Meet You in Scotland
programme.desc: A Scottish poet mistakes a writer's identity, forcing her to choose between new love or the truth.

programme.title: Maternal Instinct
programme.desc: Teen witnesses mother's shooting, hides with a cop, facing danger as they evade the killer together.

programme.title: Stone Of Destiny
programme.desc: Based on the true story, Ian Hamilton (Charlie Cox) vows to salvage national pride by returning the Stone of Destiny to its rightful place.

programme.title: The Terror, LIVE
programme.desc: Realizing he is the only way to talk to a seething terrorist, a demoted anchor attempts to win back his spot.

programme.title: The Grand Heist
programme.desc: When corrupt officials corner the ice market, a gang of 11 professionals of various fields sets out on a mission to rob ice blocks from their storage.

programme.title: Two Faces of My Girlfriend
programme.desc: Gu-chang falls in love with a charming girl, but her violent alter ego reveals she has multiple personalities.

programme.title: Sinkhole
programme.desc: Dream home vanishes in a night! Heavy rain spawns a sinkhole swallowing the whole house and the people inside.

programme.title: Make It Rain
programme.desc: A young woman struggling to find a job, stability and a life after graduation turns to stripping to make ends meet.

programme.title: Love Inside the Drug Game
programme.desc: A rent hike forces Lamar to transport drugs for shady dealer Sean, but a watchful detective and a money shortage throws the plan into chaos.

programme.title: Vampire Genesis
programme.desc: Half-alien Teh'a flees across galaxies, hunted by a race of parasitic rulers disguised as Earth's vampires. With rebels by her side, she seeks a legendary creature: the first vampire, powerful enough to end their reign of terror.

programme.title: Quiet as Kept
programme.desc: Jay is unlawfully detained. His ex-girlfriend returns, and his business partners work to clear his name. Meanwhile, a crooked cop is under suspicion for murder, and connections are made between him and Jay. Torn between duty and loyalty, Detective Johnson is caught in the middle. As the prosecution struggles, Jay and his business partners work to exist the dangerous world cleanly.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: With Lepka's gunboat in pursuit, Lana uses a lifeboat to rescue Conan from the open sea.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: As they navigate a vast desert, Conan and Lana are discovered by a salvage ship captain named Patch.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Earthquakes rattle Industria as Lepka continues his search for Lana's grandfather Dr. Lao.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan, Lana, and Dr. Lao take to the skies in Dr. Lao's flying machine.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Trapped by Lepka, Lana and Dr. Lao must navigate Industria's Core Block in search of machine parts.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan, Jimsy, and Lana reunite with Dyce on the Barracuda, meanwhile Dr. Lao must return to Industria to help save its residents.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan, Jimsy, and Lana explore High Harbor and meet the villagers but Jimsy can't help but get into mischief.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan and Jimsy must catch a wild pig in order to redeem themselves with Orlo, the leader of a local gang.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Lana has a nightmarish vision that Dr. Lao's flying machine is engulfed in flames and fears an attack Conan does his best to try and ease her worries.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: When Industria soldiers reach High Harbor, the villagers must band together to defend their home.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan and Lana try to evade Industria's soldiers but Lana is captured.

programme.title: Better Call Saul S2E3
programme.desc: Better Call Saul is the prequel to the award-winning series Breaking Bad, set six years before Saul Goodman (Bob Odenkirk) became Walter White's lawyer.

programme.title: Better Call Saul S2E4
programme.desc: Better Call Saul is the prequel to the award-winning series Breaking Bad, set six years before Saul Goodman (Bob Odenkirk) became Walter White's lawyer.

programme.desc: Better Call Saul is the prequel to the award-winning series Breaking Bad, set six years before Saul Goodman (Bob Odenkirk) became Walter White's lawyer.

programme.title: Better Call Saul S2E6
programme.desc: Jimmy finds comfort in a familiar place. Kim receives a life-changing proposal. Mike is pushed to the limit when what he holds dearest is threatened.

programme.title: Better Call Saul S2E7
programme.desc: Better Call Saul is the prequel to the award-winning series Breaking Bad, set six years before Saul Goodman (Bob Odenkirk) became Walter White's lawyer.

programme.title: Better Call Saul S2E1
programme.desc: Better Call Saul is the prequel to the award-winning series Breaking Bad, set six years before Saul Goodman (Bob Odenkirk) became Walter White's lawyer.

programme.title: The Way
programme.desc: Martin Sheen plays Tom, an American doctor who comes to France to collect the remains of his adult son who was killed in the Pyrenees in a storm while walking The Camino de Santiago - also known as 'The Way of Saint James'. Driven by his desire to understand his lost son, Tom decides to embark on the historical pilgrimage, leaving his California life behind. Armed only with his son's backpack and guidebook, he begins the 800km historical pilgrimage but soon discovers that he won't be alone on this journey - he meets other pilgrims from around the world, all broken and looking for greater meaning in their lives. From the hardship experienced along "The Way" an unlikely group of misfits are bonded and Tom begins to learn the difference between 'The life we live and the life we choose.'

programme.title: The World's Fastest Indian
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins stars as Burt Munro, a man who never let the dreams of youth fade. After a lifetime of perfecting his classic Indian motorcycle, Burt set off from the bottom of the world to test his bike at the Bonneville Salt Flats in Utah. With all the odds against him, he set a new speed record and captured the spirit of his times. Burt Munro's 1967 world record remains unbroken and his legend lives on today.

programme.title: Upside Down (2012)
programme.desc: Ever since Adam (Jim Sturgess) and Eden (Kirsten Dunst) fell in love as teens, their bond has faced astronomical odds. The pair are separated, not just by social class or the political system committed to keeping them apart, but also by a freak planetary condition: they live on twinned, parallel worlds with opposing gravitational forces. Years later, after suffering the pain of being torn apart, Adam decides to set out on a quest to once again find Eden and reconnect with his lost love.

programme.title: Poster Boys
programme.desc: When broke Irishman, Al Clancy, mistakenly agrees to mind his smart-ass 10-year-old nephew, Karl, for a week, his job and home are placed in jeopardy. In a bold bid to save Al's unfulfilling but undemanding job as a poster boy, they steal the family camper-van, embarking on a madcap, impulsive postering tour across Ireland. But the unlikely pair soon discover it may be more difficult than they realised to survive a week in each other's company... An "Irish gem that will have you in stitches" (Film Ireland), this semi-autobiographical comedy from debut Director Dave Minogue received its world premiere at this year's Galway Film Fleadh. An independent production featuring a range of brilliant new Irish talent (and a memorable cameo from Boyzone/Corrie's Keith Duffy!), this festival favourite is a road-trip adventure with undeniable heart and an uplifting message at its core that families need to look out for each other no matter what circumstances they may find themselves in.

programme.title: Firequake
programme.desc: A scientist creates a new unstable energy source that accidently starts devastating earthquakes around the globe. Starring Alexandra Pool, Zoe Barker and Nigel Barber (2014).

programme.title: Deadly Voltage
programme.desc: A deadly lightning storm brings terror and destruction to a remote region. But the storm appears to be growing at an alarming rate. Can anything be done? Stars Mike Dopud (2015)

programme.title: Disaster Zone: Volcano in New York
programme.desc: The manager of a construction crew has to save New York when experimental technology causes a volcano to erupt under the city. Starring Michael Ironside and Costas Mandylor (2006).

programme.title: Settlers
programme.desc: The first humans on Mars do what they must to survive the cosmic elements and each other. Starring Jonny Lee Miller (2021)

programme.title: Detective McLean
programme.desc: In this pilot episode Detective Allison McLean puts her law-breaking brother Tim behind bars, and quickly decides to move his two resentful teenaged kids in with her own two children and devoted husband. Meanwhile, Allison and her partner race the clock to find a wounded pregnant girl and her boyfriend who have committed a robbery.

programme.title: Detective McLean
programme.desc: Allison and Devin are called in to investigate the mysterious murder of the owner of a restaurant that hires ex-cons, one of whom Allison has helped in the past. Meanwhile, Mariah and Cameron try to find ways to fit in at their new school with some unwanted help from Jeff and Rachel.

programme.title: You May Now Kill The Bride
Noah
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as Noah in the timeless story of courage, sacrifice, and hope. This visually stunning, action-adventure is hailed as "one of the most unforgettable Biblical epics ever put on film." *Richard Roeper, Chicago-Sun-Times

programme.title: George And The Dragon
programme.desc: A knight (James Purefoy, "Rome") returning from the Crusades takes on a dragon after the disappearance of the kindly Princess Lunna (Piper Perabo, "Coyote Ugly"). With Patrick Swayze.

programme.title: Big Mommas House
programme.desc: In order to protect a woman from a robber, a male FBI agent disguises himself as an elderly woman.

programme.title: The Code
programme.desc: A veteran thief (Morgan Freeman) recruits a younger crook (Antonio Banderas) to help him pull off one final job in order to repay his debt to the Russian mob.

programme.title: Twilight
programme.desc: When Bella Swan moves to a small town, she falls in love with Edward Cullen, a 108-year-old vampire.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga
programme.desc: Edward leaves Bella, and she falls into another difficult relationship - this time with Jacob Black.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga
programme.desc: Bella is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

programme.title: Come Away
programme.desc: The film follows the adventures of siblings Alice and Peter who transform into Peter Pan and Alice in Wonderland in a bid to help their parents - played by Oyelowo and Jolie - overcome the tragedy of losing their eldest son. Peter and Alice find strength in the power of their imaginations and set off on a real adventure to try and rescue the family - escaping to a destiny of eternal boyhood in the distant isle of Neverland - whilst Alice delves into a world of Wonderland.

programme.title: Wheeler
programme.desc: An emotional, uplifting drama starring Stephen Dorff (Immortals) and featuring country music legend Kris Kristofferson (Blade). Aspiring musician Wheeler travels to Nashville with the lifelong dream of trying his hand at country music. As Wheeler chases his dream, the line between reality and fiction blurs in this touching and enlightening tribute to old school country legends.

programme.title: The Minute You Wake Up Dead
programme.desc: A stockbroker in a small southern town gets involved in an insurance scam with a next-door neighbor that leads to multiple murders

programme.title: Jiu Jitsu
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage is back and this time hes got a sword and an alien invasion knocking at his door! Humanity is on the brink of extinction as a being from another world returns to Earth to face off against the best warriors the human race has to offer. Frank Grillo (Captain America: Winter Soldier), Alain Moussi (Kickboxer: Retaliation) and Tony Jaa (Ong-Bak) make up the action-packed ensemble.

programme.title: Love At Sea
programme.desc: Olivia gets the opportunity to organise an exciting event aboard a luxury cruise.

programme.title: Stepping Into Love
programme.desc: Claire has the difficult task to help a maverick artist exhibit a success. In the short time she spends with Devan, the developer their feelings grow but will their story lead to a happy ending?

programme.title: Same Time Next Week
programme.desc: A widow and a widower struggle to let go of the past as their friendship blossoms into romance.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: When popular love and relationship podcaster and future author, Nikki Parsons is dumped by her boyfriend the day before she meets her new publisher, she has to think fast.

programme.title: In A Day
programme.desc: A young woman spends a curiously unpredictable day with a stranger.

programme.title: A Time To Dance
programme.desc: John and Abby may have been the perfect couple, but not anymore. When their daughter surprises them with her engagement, their divorce is put on hold. Will the romance surrounding the wedding be enough to rekindle what they have lost?

programme.title: Modern Persuasion
programme.desc: A sexy, modern telling of Jane Austen's "Persuasion." Wren (Alicia Witt: Orange is the New Black) is a happy, single and self-confessed workaholic who, after rising to the top of the corporate ladder, finds herself coming home to her cat every night.

programme.title: Save The Wedding
programme.desc: Meg and Tyler have never gotten along with each other but when they work together to save the best friends' wedding, they discover they actually make a good team and begin a little romance of their own.

programme.title: Meet My Valentine
programme.desc: Diagnosed with terminal cancer, Tom reconnects with his wife Valentine to create an online dating profile to secretly find her a replacement husband.

programme.title: Off The Menu
programme.desc: An unlikely heir to a Mexican fast-food franchise goes ‘cuisine' hunting for the next culinary big thing he can ‘borrow,' and finds himself in a small, dusty New Mexican town where people come from all over to salivate over the culinary treats of a local female chef.

programme.title: Love Finds You In Valentine
programme.desc: What can a California girl do with a few dusty acres of land in rural Nebraska? So Kennedy Blaine wonders after she inherits a ranch in the small town of Valentine, Nebraska. As Kennedy makes arrangements to sell the property, she finds herself drawn to the ranch and to its attractive manager, Derek Sterling. She decides to spend the summer in her ancestral home and reconnect with family members. But soon Kennedy is subjected to harassment by someone who clearly wants her to leave Valentine. Depending on God's protection and Derek's assistance, she sets out to discover who is behind the offenses. But when her search reveals painful details about her family and raises questions about Derek's own past, will Kennedy still want to know the truth?

programme.title: Cream of the Crop
programme.desc: High-school Ag Science teacher Jodi Stafford meets commercial real-estate marketing specialist Mike Jared during her struggle to save her family's ailing dairy farm.

programme.title: Braving Rapids
programme.desc: A family goes on a river rafting trip as they process a great loss. Along the way they find a wolf pup. When some unscrupulous folks spot the wolf as well and conspire to steal and sell it, the family and guides fight to protect the pup. Could their journey to deliver the wolf safely to wildlife officials be just the thing to guide them to healing?

programme.title: WWJD II The Woodcarver
programme.desc: A troubled youth vandalizes a church and winds up in a close association with the woodcarver whose work he destroyed.

programme.title: I Think I Do
programme.desc: The relationship between three sisters, as one is left at the altar on her wedding day.

programme.title: Groomzilla
programme.desc: A newly engaged woman makes a wish that her fiancee take the planning of their wedding seriously, and to her surprise and dismay, her wish comes true.

programme.title: WWJD What Would Jesus Do?
programme.desc: A group of Americans - a singer, a newspaper editor, a pastor and a real estate mogul - vow to walk in the steps of Jesus. Every day, every decision becomes a turning point in their lives as they must ask themselves "What Would Jesus Do?"

programme.title: Another Man's Wife
programme.desc: After a tragic car accident, a family gets away to a remote mountain cabin to recover and rebuild their lives. During their vacation, a handsome man befriends them only to get revenge and destroy what is left of their fragile lives.

programme.title: Think Like A Man Too
programme.desc: All the couples are back for a wedding in Las Vegas, but plans for a romantic weekend go awry when their various misadventures get them into some compromising situations that threaten to derail the big event.

programme.title: Little Man
programme.desc: A short, baby-faced jewel thief masquerades as a baby to try to recover a stolen diamond.

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: Two disgraced FBI agents go way undercover in an effort to protect hotel heiresses the Wilton Sisters from a kidnapping plot.

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: Two disgraced FBI agents go way undercover in an effort to protect hotel heiresses the Wilton Sisters from a kidnapping plot.

programme.title: In Old New Mexico
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid and Pancho kidnap Ellen Roth, a woman accused of murder, and take her to a mission. She claims her innocence, revealing a mysterious doctor who caused a death. Cisco believes her and plans to expose the truth. He strikes a deal with Bill Hastings for part of an inheritance, but the stakes rise when a new plot unfolds.

programme.title: The Gay Amigo
programme.desc: Mistaken for bandits, Cisco and Pancho are captured by the Captain, who releases them to track the real gang. Cisco discovers the true leaders are the editor and blacksmith. programme.title: George And The Dragon
programme.desc: A knight (James Purefoy, "Rome") returning from the Crusades takes on a dragon after the disappearance of the kindly Princess Lunna (Piper Perabo, "Coyote Ugly"). With Patrick Swayze.

programme.title: Big Momma's House
programme.desc: In order to protect a woman from a robber, a male FBI agent disguises himself as an elderly woman.

programme.title: The Code
programme.desc: A veteran thief (Morgan Freeman) recruits a younger crook (Antonio Banderas) to help him pull off one final job in order to repay his debt to the Russian mob.

programme.title: Elektra
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Elektra unwittingly takes part in her former teacher's test when she protects a former target and his daughter from "The Hand," a sinister crime syndicate of martial arts fighters.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: A blind girl receives a cornea transplant so that she is able to see again. However, she gets more than she bargains for when she realizes she can see disturbing ghosts.

programme.title: Under Suspicion
programme.desc: From Emmy award winning director Stephen Hopkins and the producers of Fight Club, we follow a wealthy attorney who is accused of the murder of a young girl. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Gene Hackman, Thomas Jane

programme.title: Big Momma's House
programme.desc: In order to protect a woman from a robber, a male FBI agent disguises himself as an elderly woman.

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: An orphaned teenager is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly, granting him superhuman powers in this parody of films like Spider-Man, X-Men, and Fantastic Four.

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: George is a retired soccer pro whose glory days are behind him. Burnt out on his playboy lifestyle and bankrupted by a string of bad investments, he moves back to Virginia to reconnect with his estranged ex-wife and neglected son.

programme.title: Let Go
programme.desc: Featuring the king of comedy Kevin Hart, this hilarious, unconventional and heartfelt journey is all about love, loss and other felonies! Discontent parole officer Walter is struggling with the humdrums of married life.

programme.title: The Ex
programme.desc: A slacker is forced to work for his father-in-law after his pregnant wife steps away from her high-paying job. Starring Zach Braff and Jason Bateman.

programme.title: How To Be A Latin Lover
programme.desc: Eugenio Derbez (INSTRUCTIONS NOT INCLUDED) and Salma Hayek head an all-star cast in this hilarious comedy about an aging ladies’ man who learns that love and trust must be earned.

programme.title: Marilyn Hotchkiss' Ballroom Dancing & Charm School
programme.desc: A widowed man's life turns upside down when he embarks on a journey to find a dying man's long lost love.

programme.title: Joe Somebody
programme.desc: Tim Allen is Joe, a guy whose life has been steadily changing for the worse. When the office bully goes too far, Joe decides it's time to turn himself from a nobody into a somebody.

programme.title: In A Day
programme.desc: A young woman spends a curiously unpredictable day with a stranger.

programme.title: The Cannonball Run
programme.desc: The classic comedy with cool stars and even cooler cars! Based on a true race event, Burt Reynolds leads an all-star cast in the ultimate quest to win The Cannonball Run.

programme.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
programme.desc: People accuse their loved ones of being emotionless impostors. At first, Dr. Bennell tries to convince them they’re wrong, but they’re not. Plant-like extraterrestrials have invaded Earth, taking possession of their souls while they sleep.

programme.title: The Shape of Things to Come
programme.desc: Sometime in the future, man has set up colonies on the Moon, when Earth becomes uninhabitable. A madman decides to destroy the Moon colonies with his robots and automated ships, and only three people and their robot can stop him.

programme.title: The Lady Vanishes
programme.desc: Alfred Hitchcock mixes suspense, comedy, witty dialog, and endearing character in this charming, classic mystery. When a kindly governess vanishes from a train, no one believes she even exists…except for one woman who sets about solving the mystery.

programme.title: Summer of Fear
programme.desc:
A teenage girl's(Linda Blair) life is turned upside down after her cousin moves into her house, and as time goes by she begins to suspect that she may be a practitioner of witchcraft.
Director: Wes Craven

programme.title: Gold
programme.desc: A ruthless global cabal of financial investors plan to manipulate the price of gold by flooding one of South Africa’s top gold mines. Starring: Roger Moore, Susannah York, Ray Milland, Bradford Dillman, Bernard Horsfall, John Hussey

programme.title: Christiane F.
programme.desc: A teen girl in 1970's Berlin becomes addicted to heroin. Everything in her life slowly begins to distort and disappear as she befriends a small crew of junkies and falls in love with a drug-abusing male prostitute.

programme.title: The Cut Throats
programme.desc: A captain hand-picks half a dozen American soldiers for a desperate mission in Germany, to get possession of vital WW2 plans - but he keeps another secret up his sleeve.

programme.title: Eugenie De Sade
programme.desc: Eugenie, a shy young woman, lives with her stepfather, a famous writer of erotica. After reading one of his books, she develops an attraction to him. Sensing her desire, he pulls Eugenie into his twisted world of seduction and dark obsessions.

programme.title: The Centerfold Girls
programme.desc: A depraved religious fanatic sets out to punish all the "immoral" women who have posed for the center-fold of a men's magazine.

programme.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
programme.desc: People accuse their loved ones of being emotionless impostors. At first, Dr. Bennell tries to convince them they’re wrong, but they’re not. Plant-like extraterrestrials have invaded Earth, taking possession of their souls while they sleep.

programme.desc: In a horse-riding rodeo contest bad guys want John Weston to lose. When he doesn't go along they add some insurance: a poisoned needle just under his saddle. Starring: John Wayne, Polly Ann Young, Anita Campillo

programme.title: John Wayne: An Innocent Man
programme.desc: Wrongly imprisoned for murder, a man escapes and infiltrates a gang of outlaws to find the real killer. In Vibrant Color! Starring: John Wayne, Nancy Shubert, Lane Chandler

programme.title: Invitation To A Gunfighter
programme.desc: In New Mexico, a Confederate veteran returns home to find his fiancée married to a Union soldier, his Yankee neighbors rallied against him and his property sold by the local banker who then hires a gunman to kill him.

programme.title: The Gambler II: (Part 1)
programme.desc: Brady Hawkes, Billy Montana, and Jeremiah Hawkes are on a train bound for a huge gambling event when the train is taken over by a gang of vicious killers in search of money. As ransom, the gang takes young Jeremiah hostage.

programme.title: The Gambler II: (Part 2)
programme.desc: Brady Hawkes, Billy Montana, and Jeremiah Hawkes are on a train bound for a huge gambling event when the train is taken over by a gang of vicious killers in search of money. As ransom, the gang takes young Jeremiah hostage.

programme.title: The Star Packer
programme.desc: A gang working for The Shadow is terrorizing the town. John Travers decides to take on the job of sheriff and do something about it. Starring: John Wayne, Verna Hillie, George 'Gabby' Hayes

programme.title: Stagecoach
programme.desc: A stagecoach trip is complicated by Geronimo being on the warpath in the area. The passengers include a drunk doctor, two women, a thieving bank manager, and the famous Ringo Kid. Starring: John Wayne, Claire Trevor, Andy Devine

programme.title: Into the Badlands
programme.desc: A bounty hunter searches the west for a wanted outlaw named Red Roundtree.

programme.title: Bells of San Angelo
programme.desc: A silver mine with a secret entrance along the Mexican border is the setting for this typical Roy Rogers western with music.

programme.title: Red Sun: Red Sun

programme.title: Paradise Canyon
programme.desc: An undercover agent for the government is sent to round up a gang of counterfeiters operating near the Mexican border. Starring: John Wayne, Marion Burns, Reed Howes

programme.title: Banana Joe: Banana Joe

programme.title: Gleaming The Cube
programme.desc: A young avid skateboarder uncovers a conspiracy while investigating his adoptive brother's mysterious death.

programme.title: Redline
programme.desc: Starring Eddie Griffin and Nathan Phillips. With the speedometer maxed out, a group of exotic car fanatics hit the streets in hopes of winning a life-changing sum of 24 million dollars. Every rule is broken as these drivers.

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.

programme.title: Inferno: Skyscraper Escape

programme.title: Enemies Closer
programme.desc: Deep within a forest on the US-Canadian border, two sworn enemies must work together to escape a ruthless drug cartel hell-bent on retrieving a drug shipment which went missing there.

programme.title: Direct Contact
programme.desc: An American prisoner (Dolph Lundgren, "Rocky IV") in a Russian jail is given a chance at freedom if he can rescue a kidnapped American woman.

programme.title: The Debt Collector
programme.desc: French is a martial artist that takes on a job as a mob debt collector in order to make ends meet. He does whatever it takes to chase down individuals until he meets a bartender that makes him question whether he should do the right thing.

programme.title: Revolver
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.

programme.title: Dead at 17
programme.desc: Jason and his friends find themselves in trouble when a girl they are partying with is accidentally killed. In a panic, they hide her body. Worried that he would confess, two of the boys kill Jason and make it look like a suicide.

programme.title: Saving Emily
programme.desc: When her daughter is diagnosed with leukemia, a woman (Alexandra Paul) and her new husband get pulled into the whirlwind life of her seedy ex-husband who tries to extort money from them in exchange for his life-saving bone marrow.

programme.title: The Bachelor Next Door
programme.desc: A newly engaged couple becomes intrigued by the young stranger who moves in next door. He's handsome, friendly and very helpful, but he's no stranger.

programme.title: Til Lies Do Us Part
programme.desc: When a popular Philadelphia restaurant critic suspects that her husband is cheating on her, she hires a private investigator who turns out to have his own agenda.

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.desc: An innocent girl is kidnapped and held hostage for two years causing her to develop multiple personalities and making her the number one suspect when her English professor is brutally murdered.
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: All Around The Town

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.desc: Having the winning lottery jackpot ticket is the best thing that could have happened to delivery man Bill Regan. Determined to find out what happened, a friend retraces Bill's delivery stops and discovers they lead to her own husband.

programme.title: The Wrong Life Coach
programme.desc: A woman who hires a life coach discovers that she isn't what she seems.

programme.title: Despite The Falling Snow
programme.desc: In 1950s Moscow, communist Katya secretly spies for the Americans in the Cold War arms race. When she lands her biggest assignment, stealing secrets from rising government star Alexander, the last thing she expects is to fall in love with him.

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.desc: The personal ads of New York's trendiest magazines become the hunting ground for a bizarre killer whose calling card is a single, high heeled dancing shoe and one woman is determined to find out his true identity after the murder of her friend.
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: Loves Music, Love To Dance

programme.title: If I Can’t Have You
programme.desc: A radio host is targeted by an unknown stalker.

programme.title: Star Kid

programme.title: Fantastic Planet
programme.desc: On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.

programme.title: Dark Star

programme.title: Area Q

programme.title: StarCrash

programme.title: Settlers
programme.desc: Following ecological disaster, a family from Earth do what they must to survive on a desolate Mars homestead.

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Five young people find themselves stranded in Moscow, fighting to survive in the wake of a devastating alien attack.

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.

programme.title: The Day Time Ended
programme.desc: A futuristic solar home in the far desert was supposed to be their refuge from urban crime. To their horror, the family discovers they're caught in a mind-boggling time warp caused by mysterious aliens with a sinister secret.

programme.title: Fantastic Planet
programme.desc: On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.

programme.title: Heaven Must Wait
programme.desc: An American inherits an old village church in England, where treasure is buried. Greedy Mr. Slee scents his opportunity to snatch the treasure. Diggity, a little cherub trying to earn his wings, helps uncover the treasure for the benefit of the village.

programme.title: Ghosthunters On Icy Trails

programme.desc: When a boy loses his dog in his backyard he finds it’s gone through a portal which leads to another dimension of our universe. He must rely on his friends and family to get his dog back before the portal closes.

programme.desc: Tired of being bullied, Cassandra Evans prays that her nemesis, Katie Sharp, the queen bee of social media, would know what it's like to walk a day in her shoes. Her prayer is answered in an unexpected way when they get "Switched."

programme.desc: The Tickler passes off counterfeit bills in an attempt to lure the Monster Squad into a trap.

programme.title: Monster Squad: The Ringmaster
programme.desc: The Ringmaster holds children hostage as part of a larger scheme to buy out and close down all of the toy stores in America.

programme.title: Monster Squad
programme.desc: Frank and Dracula sign up for music lessons in an attempt to foil the mad musicians who robbed a telethon.

programme.title: Monster Squad: No Face
programme.desc: Mayor Goldwyn gives the deed to the city to Chief Running Nose, and then he declares all crime legal. Before long, the Monster Squad discovers No Face has been masquerading as both of them.

programme.title: The Little Shop of Horrors
programme.desc: A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's carnivorous, forcing him to kill to feed it.

programme.title: The Haunting
programme.desc: A lawyer who doesn't believe in ghosts is haunted after moving into a family mansion. Starring: Tim Daly, Tom Arnold, Zoe Saldana

programme.desc: Bella and Edward gather werewolves, vampires and other allies to help them protect their daughter from the Volturi.

programme.title: The Cabin in the Woods

programme.title: The Changeover

programme.title: 6 Balas
programme.desc: Quando a filha de um lutador de MMA é sequestrada, há somente um homem que pode ajudar a encontrá-la – um notório ex-mercenário, cujo boatos, levou seis tiros no peito.

programme.title: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok. Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: O Anel do Rei - A Última Batalha
programme.desc: Baseado em uma lenda do século 13 e estrelado por Edwin Endre (da série Vikings) e James Bloor (Dunkirk), o filme conta uma história repleta de ação épica de um jovem rei que deve aceitar sua responsabilidade e ganhar a confiança do seu povo, a fim de defender a sua liberdade contra as cruzadas violentas.

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Após se tornar alvo de seu irmão mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irmã e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob (Nicolas Cage), que precisa enfrentar vários problemas pessoais. Juntos, eles buscam o apoio de Gallain (Hayden Christensen), um lendário cavaleiro conhecido como Fantasma Branco.

programme.title: Amazonas Lendárias

Ambientado na Dinastia Song, quando os homens do Clã Yang foram mortos em massa, as mulheres, desde a avó idosa às mulheres mais jovens, vestiram armaduras e guiaram o exército à vitória.

programme.title: Sharknado 2: A Segunda Onda
programme.desc: Quando um furacão de categoria 7 atinge Nova York, as enchentes trazem milhares de tubarões. Para piorar a situação, os tornados logo pontilham o horizonte. Enquanto os Sharknadoes devastam a cidade, nenhum veículo, edifício ou monumento nacional está seguro.

programme.title: 6 Balas
programme.desc: Quando a filha de um lutador de MMA é sequestrada, há somente um homem que pode ajudar a encontrá-la – um notório ex-mercenário, cujo boatos, levou seis tiros no peito.

programme.title: Juízo Final
programme.desc: Um vírus se espalha por toda a Escócia, infectando e matando milhares de pessoas. As autoridades colocam em quarentena brutal o país, que sucumbe ao medo e ao caos. Três décadas depois, o vírus ressurge violentamente em Londres.

programme.title: Sangue Na Veia
programme.desc: Uma mulher se vê contra o submundo do crime quando seu marido desaparece durante a lua-de-mel. Decidida a recuperá-lo, ela enfrentará qualquer um que cruzar seu caminho.

programme.title: Entre Inimigos

Por uma estranha coincidência os grupos procuram abrigo na mesma cabana. Eles têm que lutar para sobreviver ao brutal inverno, para poder voltar à guerra

programme.title: Codinome Cassius 7
programme.desc: Um agente aposentado da CIA se une a um agente do FBI para desvendar o mistério do assassinato de um senador.

programme.desc: O rei do Egito é avisado da profecia de que Messias chegará. Para evitar que o inimigo sobreviva, ele ordena que matem todos os bebês do sexo masculino.

programme.desc: Elias está prestes a encerrar seu ministério como profeta em Israel. Eliseu que será seu sucessor, o acompanha em seus últimos passos.

programme.title: Dear Dumb Diary
programme.desc: Baseado na série de livros, de sucesso, ‘Querido Diário Otário’ de Jim Benton.

programme.title: Uma Questão de Fé
programme.desc: Uma garota cristã influenciada pelas aulas do professor se afasta da fé, seu pai tenta fazer algo a respeito.

programme.title: O Destino de Grace

programme.title: O Diário de Tati
programme.desc: A adolescente Tati conta, de forma divertida, todos os problemas de sua juventude ao seu diário. Desde ficar em recuperação em matemática até os esforços para conseguir fisgar Zeca, sua paixão atual.

programme.title: Hora de Recomeçar
programme.desc: Uma jovem problemática precisa decidir entre ter uma vida divertida e sem preocupações da cidade grande, ou uma vida rural sem frescuras e muito trabalho duro para descobrir quem ela realmente é.

programme.title: O Garoto de Ouro
programme.desc: Quando Mats encontra um par de calças que contém uma quantidade ilimitada de dinheiro no bolso a vida

programme.desc: Depois de ser sequestrado por alienígenas, um jovem cientista da NASA fica obcecado em encontrar pistas sobre o que aconteceu quando descobre que ninguém acredita que sua experiência realmente aconteceu.

programme.title: Eu Sei Onde Você Mora
programme.desc: Um homem obcecado por limpeza, tem sonhos estranhos e guarda no inconsciente um mistério do passado.

programme.title: Trauma
programme.desc: Após sofrer um grave acidente de carro, April desperta sem lembrar do que aconteceu.

programme.title: Eles Existem
programme.desc: Para cinco amigos, o final de semana em uma cabana pelos remotos bosques do Texas será uma aventura repleta de festas. Mas tudo muda quando o que parecia só diversão se torna um terror ao serem perseguidos pelo feroz e lendário Pé Grande.

programme.title: A Face do Mal
programme.desc: Ao lado dos pais e das duas irmãs, Evan Asher (Harrison Gilbertson) é um jovem tímido e pouco sociável que se muda para uma grande casa, cujo passado é marcado por uma família que perdeu todos os filhos. Aproveitando o baixo preço e sem problemas superstições, os Asher se mudam para o local. Lá, Evan aproveita o tempo livre para desenvolver uma amizade/namoro com a vizinha Sam (Liana Liberato). Curiosos, os dois vão explorar o passado sombrio do local e despertar forças nada amigáveis.

programme.title: Fora de Alcance
programme.desc: Um empresário sem escrúpulos, contrata o jovem rastreador, Ben, para guiá-lo pelo árido deserto de Mojave.

programme.title: A Presença
programme.desc: Depois de ser sequestrado por alienígenas, um jovem cientista da NASA fica obcecado em encontrar pistas sobre o que aconteceu quando descobre que ninguém acredita que sua experiência realmente aconteceu.

programme.title: Zumbiologia - Aproveite essa Noite
programme.desc: Lung (Michael Ning) e Chi-Yeung (Louis Cheung) são dois jovens melhores amigos que vivem a vida de maneira irresponsável e despreocupada. Quando um estranho monstro surge na cidade e começa a transformar as pessoas em zumbis, eles decidem se tornar heróis e embarcam em uma jornada para salvar a Terra.

programme.title: Ouija Exorcismo
programme.desc: Em 1985, um exorcista famoso prendeu um demônio horrível dentro de um tabuleiro Ouija. Pensando que o tabuleiro era um jogo, seu filho jogou sem obedecer às regras e soltou o demônio.

programme.title: A Maldição da Floresta
programme.desc: Adam e Clare se mudam para uma área rural com seu filho recém-nascido. Eles logo começam a receber avisos sobre espíritos malignos na região, mas a jovem família prefere apreciar a beleza da floresta.

programme.title: Os Caçadores
programme.desc: Uma família de arqueólogos caça artefatos de contos de fadas que foram escondidos ao redor do mundo.

programme.title: O Guerreiro
programme.desc: Um guerreiro traído pelo seu exército numa guerra devastadora é dado como morto e resgatado por uma princesa.

programme.title: Quem é Morto Sempre Aparece
programme.desc: Para resolver seus problemas financeiros, um agente de viagens está de olho em um cadáver congelado, que por acaso está sendo procurado por dois assassinos.

programme.title: Inferno Na Ilha
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real, o filme se passa em 1919 e mostra a dura realidade de jovens delinquentes presos no reformatório da Ilha de Bastoy, na Noruega, onde são víPmas de um regime opressor e sádico praticado pelos funcionários e comandado pelo diretor do local. Earling, de 17 anos, chega a instituição com um plano: escapar da ilha.

programme.title: A Família
programme.desc: Um chefe mafioso e sua família são transferidos para uma cidade dorminhoca na França, sob o programa de proteção de testemunhas, depois de denunciar a máfia.

programme.title: Laços de um Crime
programme.desc: Quando a polícia descobre uma jovem brutalmente assassinada, os irmãos Joe Fairburn (Paul Bettany) e Chrissie Fairburn se juntam ao seu supervisor, Robert (Mark Strong), para investigar o principal suspeito: Jason Buliegh, um criminoso sexual. Forçados a liberar Jason da custódia da polícia, os Fairburns tomam o assunto em suas próprias mãos; sufocados pela sombra de seu pai.

programme.title: Vincent N Roxxy
programme.desc: Vincent (Emile Hirsch) é um solitário em uma pequena cidade e Roxxy (Zoë Kravitz) uma rebelde roqueira. Quando ambos correm perigo por se envolverem, em diferentes circunstâncias, com um temido criminoso, eles se apaixonam, descobrindo que a violência os seguirá para qualquer lugar.

programme.title: Acima de Qualquer Suspeita
programme.desc: C.J. Nichols (Jesse Metcalfe) é um jornalista investigativo disposto a denunciar o famoso promotor Mark Hunter (Michael Douglas), franco candidato a governador, por manipular provas em seus processos. Para isso, decide expor os perigos da evidência circunstancial, que pode levar um inocente a ser condenado, vai preso por um assassinato que não cometeu, mas seu plano começa a dar errado e a sua prisão pode ser definitiva.

programme.title: Quem é Morto Sempre Aparece
programme.desc: Para resolver seus problemas financeiros, um agente de viagens está de olho em um cadáver congelado, que por acaso está sendo procurado por dois assassinos.

programme.title: Sangue Na Veia
programme.desc: Uma mulher se vê contra o submundo do crime quando seu marido desaparece durante a lua-de-mel. Decidida a recuperá-lo, ela enfrentará qualquer um que cruzar seu caminho.

programme.title: Roubo a Máfia
programme.desc: Um casal especializado em roubar da máfia começa um trabalho tão grande que os torna alvos tanto da máfia quanto do FBI.

programme.title: Departamento Q: O Ausente
programme.desc: Dois jovens gêmeos são encontrados brutalmente assassinados em uma casa de verão. Uma série de pistas apontam na direção de estudantes de classe alta, mas o caso é encerrado quando um forasteiro se declara culpado. Vinte anos depois, o caso para na mesa do Departamento Q e Carl Morck logo percebe que algo está terrivelmente errado.

programme.title: Um Homem Comum
programme.desc: Um criminoso de guerra escondido estabelece um relacionamento com sua única conexão com o mundo exterior - sua empregada.

programme.title: Um Plano Brilhante
programme.desc: Na Londres dos anos 1960, um zelador idoso convence um executivo com restrições de teto de vidro a ajudá-lo a roubar um punhado de diamantes de seu empregador, a London Diamond Corporation.

programme.title: Transpondo Barreiras
programme.desc: Após a morte da mãe de Vincent (com síndrome de Tourette) seu pai o interna numa clínica experimental.

programme.title: O livro
programme.desc: Um livro de auto-ajuda muda a vida de diferentes pessoas de Los Angeles. Quem é o escritor solitario?

programme.title: Muita Calma Nessa Hora
programme.desc: Três jovens amigas, Tita, Mari e Aninha, decidem mudar de situação e viajam para um local de praia para passar um fim de semana. Na estrada, eles conhecem Estrella, uma hippie que quer se esconder para tentar encontrar seu pai desconhecido.

programme.title: Albatroz
programme.desc: Beth, uma adolescente estudiosa, fica amiga de Emilia, uma aspirante a romancista recém-chegada à cidade. Emilia logo começa a ter um caso com o pai de Beth e isso pode ser a porta de entrada para consequências devastadoras.

programme.title: A Recompensa
programme.desc: Depois de passar 12 anos na prisão, um famoso ladrão está de volta para receber o que lhe é devido.

programme.title: Quem é Morto Sempre Aparece
programme.desc: Para resolver seus problemas financeiros, um agente de viagens está de olho em um cadáver congelado, que por acaso está sendo procurado por dois assassinos.

programme.title: Transpondo Barreiras
programme.desc: Após a morte da mãe de Vincent (com síndrome de Tourette) seu pai o interna numa clínica experimental.

programme.title: Walt, Antes de Mickey
programme.desc: Baseado no livro "Walt Antes do Mickey", conta os primeiros anos da carreira de Walt Disney.

programme.title: Albatroz
programme.desc: Beth, uma adolescente estudiosa, fica amiga de Emilia, uma aspirante a romancista recém-chegada à cidade. Emilia logo começa a ter um caso com o pai de Beth e isso pode ser a porta de entrada para consequências devastadoras.

programme.title: Donkey Xote
programme.desc: Uma história de Don Quixote contada por um burro de Sancho Pança...

programme.title: A História de Wim de A a Z
programme.desc: Situado por volta de 1900, Apenstreken (A História de Wim de A a Z) Esta é a história do órfão Wim, que quer muito ir à escola, em vez de passar todo o seu tempo trabalhando forçadamente na fábrica da cidade. Com uma dose de esperteza e com a ajuda de um pequeno macaco, Wim encontra novos amigos, uma escola divertida e uma família amorosa.

programme.title: Minha Quase Verdadeira História
programme.desc: A comédia de ação se passa em 1944. Hitler aparece nele como uma pessoa física e mentalmente destruída que segue o conselho de Goebbels no ator-professor do campo de concentração judeu para lições de eloquência.

programme.title: O Livro do Amor
programme.desc: Após a morte de sua esposa grávida, Henry encontra-se perdido em uma vida centrada no trabalho.

programme.title: Vinho de Verão
programme.desc: Na mesma ideia de "Sob o Sol da Toscana", James largou o emprego e seguiu seu sonho, que o levou a Espanha.

programme.title: Encontrando o Amor em Nebraska
programme.desc: Kennedy Blaine, uma garota californiana, herda um rancho na pequena cidade de Valentine, em Nebraska. Antes de vender a propriedade, ela decide passar o verão no rancho e aprender mais sobre sua família.

programme.title: S.O.S. do Amor
programme.desc: Em um cruzeiro ao Caribe, Jenny está abandonada em uma praia com seu ídolo do rock and roll.

programme.title: Preciso ser pai
programme.desc: Se os vinte anos são a época da diversão, então Jonah entende bem do assunto, até que ele recebe um diagnóstico de que ficará infértil em um mês. De repente, o garoto festeiro muda completamente suas prioridades. Ele tenta congelar o esperma, mas quando isso dá errado, só restam três semanas de fertilidade para Jonah.

programme.title: O Último Vice-Rei
programme.desc: Em 1947, Lord Mountbatten assume o cargo de último vice-rei, encarregado de entregar a Índia de volta ao seu povo. Ele massa a viver no andar de cima na casa que era antes de governantes britânicos, enquanto 500 criados hindus, muçulmanos e sikh viviam no andar de baixo.

programme.title: O Livro do Amor
programme.desc: Após a morte de sua esposa grávida, Henry encontra-se perdido em uma vida centrada no trabalho.

programme.title: O Amante da Rainha
programme.desc: Século XVIII. Caroline Mathilde é uma jovem britânica que se torna rainha da Dinamarca após se casar com o insano rei ChrisPan VII. Em viagem pela Europa, a saúde mental do monarca piora a cada dia e um acompanhamento médico torna-se necessário. O alemão Johann Struensee é escolhido e rapidamente conquista a confiança do rei, tornando-se seu confidente e principal conselheiro.

programme.title: How to Train Your Puppy/Husband
programme.desc: Uma terapeuta matrimonial tenta consertar seu próprio casamento concentrando-se em como mudar seu marido.

programme.title: Terapia do Amor
programme.desc: Rafi, uma bela produtora de fotos de 37 anos se recuperando de um divórcio recente, conhece David, um belo pintor de 23 anos recém-saído da faculdade.

programme.title: Nos Bastidores da Fama
programme.desc: A jovem e talentosa artista Noni Jean (Gugu Mbatha-Raw) alcança a sonhada fama, mas não consegue lidar muito bem com as complexidades do estrelato e sucumbe ante a pressão da vida pública. Até sua vida ser salva por Kaz Nicol (Nate Parker), um policial designado a protegê-la, que pode ser a peça chave que faltava para desbloquear o potencial artistíco dela. Apesar dos protestos de seus respectivos pais, que querem que os jovens concentrem-se em suas próprias carreiras, os dois vão lutar para seguir esse romance.

programme.title: Amor, Felicidade Ou Casamento
programme.desc: Uma terapeuta de casais, feliz no casamento, descobre que os pais estão se divorciando e tudo sai do controle.

programme.title: Um Plano Brilhante
programme.desc: Na Londres de 1960, um faxineiro convence uma executiva frustrada a planejar o roubo de diamantes na empresa onde trabalham. Chocada com a proposta do educado senhor, ela aceita, mas não demora muito para um investigador desconfie dela.

programme.title: Assassino Virtual
programme.desc: Quando uma simulação de realidade virtual criada com as personalidades de vários serial killers consegue escapar para o mundo real, um ex-policial tem a missão de deter seu reinado de terror.

programme.title: Dose Dupla
programme.desc: Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operação secreta acaba gerando resultados catastróficos.

programme.title: O Rei das Armas
programme.desc: Um criminoso se reúne com um velho amigo após uma troca de armas fracassada.

programme.title: Ghost Town - Um Espírito Atrás de Mim
programme.desc: Após uma experiência de quase morte durante uma colonoscopia, o mal-humorado dentista Bertrum Pincus fica chocado ao descobrir que pode conversar com os mortos.

programme.title: A Última Fortaleza
programme.desc: Seu serviço ao seu país o tornou um herói. Um erro o tornou prisioneiro. Para o General Eugene Irwin (Redford), é apenas uma questão de cumprir sua sentença, até que ele descobre que seus colegas de cela estão sendo assassinatos.

programme.title: Sem Lei
programme.desc: Um grupo de três amigos planeja um grande roubo que acaba dando errado quando um deles se revela um traidor. Enganado, Sonny decide assumir o problema de frente e busca vingança contra o antigo parceiro.

programme.title: Perigo em Bangkok
programme.desc: Joe é um assassino que está na Tailândia para realizar quatro assassinatos sob encomenda. Os alvos são inimigos de Surat, um chefão do crime local. Para não ter que realizar o trabalho sozinho ele contrata Kong, um batedor de carteiras.

programme.title: Dose Dupla
programme.desc: Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operação secreta acaba gerando resultados catastróficos.

programme.title: Desaparecidos
programme.desc: Alice Launey, uma especialista forense francesa ainda assombrada por seu passado, vem a Seul para apresentar seu trabalho. Ela conhecerá JinHo, um detetive que pede sua ajuda em um caso de assassinato.

programme.title: Vingança
programme.desc: Um ex-agente antinarcóticos vai atrás do responsável pelo assassinato de sua esposa, a líder de uma organização criminosa.

programme.title: Ninja
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Redenção
programme.desc: Jason Statham é um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grávida.

programme.title: O Espelho
programme.desc: Uma mulher tenta exonerar seu irmão, condenado por assassinato, provando que o crime foi cometido por um fenômeno sobrenatural.

programme.title: A Maldiçāo do Manequim
programme.desc: Não se move, não pensa, apenas mata. Para uma jovem, um encontro casual com essa entidade sobrenatural é devastador. Frankie descobre que, uma vez que ela veja o manequim, pode não haver fim à vista, exceto o dela.

programme.title: 1303 - Apartamento Do Mal
programme.desc: Janet Slate (Julianne Michelle) tem 24 anos e decide se mudar para um pequeno apartamento na cidade, sem saber que não viverá sozinha. Aos poucos, começa a experimentar eventos sobrenaturais que a levarão até a morte.

programme.title: Noite das Bruxas Macabra
programme.desc: Na noite anterior ao Halloween, um assassino mascarado persegue uma babá adolescente, mas em uma reviravolta incomum, a vítima e o agressor começam a desenvolver sentimentos românticos um pelo outro.

programme.title: Ecos do Além 2
programme.desc: Um soldado volta para casa do Iraque, assombrado pelos fantasmas daqueles que viu morrer.

programme.title: Colheita Maldita: Gênesis
programme.desc: Um jovem casal tenta libertar uma criança presa, com resultados catastróficos.

programme.title: O Espantalho
programme.desc: Amigos presos encontram espantalhos sobrenaturais em uma fazenda isolada.

programme.title: A Lista (2008)
programme.desc: Um contador é levado por seu amigo advogado a uma misteriosa casa de swing chamada The List. Mas nesse novo mundo, ele logo se torna o principal suspeito do desaparecimento de uma mulher e de um roubo multimilionário.

programme.title: A Arma
programme.desc: Dallas é uma máquina de matar. Seus ataques a gangues de motociclistas e laboratórios de metanfetamina irritam o chefe da máfia de Las Vegas, que sequestra sua namorada. Dallas não irá parar até que a justiça seja feita.

programme.title: O Franco-Atirador
programme.desc: Depois de uma longa carreira como matador de aluguel, Martin Terrier pretende se aposentar e passar o resto da vida ao lado de sua amada. Mas ele descobre que está sendo traído por pessoas de sua confiança!

programme.title: Submundo
programme.desc: Quando os detetives da cidade grande se recusam a continuar investigando o assassinato do seu irmão mais novo cometido pela própria gangue, o xerife de uma cidade pequena se disfarça para encontrar o assassino do irmão e vingar a sua morte.

programme.title: A Face Oculta da Lei
programme.desc: A investigação de um roubo com homicídio desencadeia uma série de eventos que farão com que um policial corrupto do LAPD questione suas táticas.

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: Num futuro incerto, a raça humana foi quase totalmente devastada da Terra. Para salvar o mundo, os governantes decidiram criar uma droga capaz de inibir o sentimento humano e garantir a paz para sempre.

programme.title: Soldado do futuro
programme.desc: Vincent se apaixona por Ava enquanto eles estão criando a primeira inteligência artificial consciente do mundo. O trabalho dá errado quando os militares roubam sua tecnologia para fazer uma arma robótica que ninguém pode controlar.

programme.title: Infectados
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: O Som do Trovão
programme.desc: No ano de 2055, o esporte predileto dos ricos é viajar no tempo para caçar dinossauros. A diversão tem apenas uma regra: é proibido trazer do passado qualquer lembrancinha, viva ou morta, já que isto geraria uma série de reações que modificaria o presente

programme.title: Área 51
programme.desc: Quando os repórteres têm acesso à Base Aérea da Área 51, uma falha de segurança transforma a base protegida do governo em um horrível destino de terror.

programme.title: A Colônia
programme.desc: Em 2018, depois de um desastre pela mudança climática que levou a uma nova idade do gelo, um clandesttino reduto de sobreviventes devem lutar para preservar a humanidade de uma ameaça mais selvagem do que os elementos.

programme.title: 2019: O Ano Da Extinção
programme.desc: O ano é 2019; e uma praga desconhecida transformou a população mundial em vampiros sedentos de sangue. À medida que os humanos e seu sangue se tornam mais escassos; Os vampiros devem procurar novas maneiras de satisfazer seu desejo.

programme.title: Presságio
programme.desc: Um professor universitário se depara com uma série de números encontrados em uma cápsula do tempo e percebe que são a previsão de cada desastre nos últimos 50 anos. Com mais desastres previsto, ele parte em uma missão para ver se eles podem ser parados.

programme.title: Ataque Fatal
programme.desc: Tempos depois de um massacre provocado por uma guerra entre a polícia e uma gangue, três sobreviventes se reencontram durante uma missão e a tensão ressurge ainda mais forte - um novo ataque será inevitável!

programme.title: O Franco-Atirador
programme.desc: Depois de uma longa carreira como matador de aluguel, Martin Terrier pretende se aposentar e passar o resto da vida ao lado de sua amada. Mas ele descobre que está sendo traído por pessoas de sua confiança!

programme.title: Tráfico Humano
programme.desc: Traumatizado pela morte de um inocente, Bradley, um assassino de aluguel, se isola da sociedade e vagueia pelas perigosas ruas de um gueto do centro da cidade em busca de sentido para sua vida.

programme.title: Torturado
programme.desc: Jimmy é contratado pelo misterioso chefe do crime Ziggy para obter uma confissão do seu contador por meio de tortura. Mas Jimmy na verdade não é quem ele aparenta ser; é um agente infiltrado do FBI

programme.title: Fábrica de Animais
programme.desc: Condenado por tráfico, o jovem Ron tenta não chamar muito a atenção, mas logo é notado por outros presos. Para não ser violentado, faz amizade com o líder de uma gangue e começa a receber proteção e benefícios. Até que chega o dia de pagar a dívida.

programme.title: Longe de Casa
programme.desc: Um ex-jogador problemático da Major League Baseball volta para casa para confrontar seu padrasto abusivo.

programme.title: Um Vampiro no Brooklyn
programme.desc: O excêntrico vampiro Maximillian viaja até Nova York para procurar uma esposa e dar continuidade à sua linhagem. Lá ele conhece a bela detetive Rita que ele acredita ser a descendente de uma ordem de vampiros.

programme.title: A Promoção
programme.desc: Dois sub-gerentes de uma rede de supermercados disputam uma promoção cobiçada.

programme.title: Caindo na Estrada
programme.desc: Quando um vídeo muito picante de Josh (Breckin Meyer) ficando muito louco com a sensual Beth (Amy Smart) é enviado acidentalmente para sua namorada, ele tem três dias para chegar ao Texas antes que a fita chegue!

programme.title: Duplex
programme.desc: Os jovens nova-iorquinos Alex e Nancy encontraram um lugar perfeito para compartilhar um futuro brilhante: o térreo de um belo e velho duplex, mas este vem com um acessório que eles não esperavam.

programme.title: Bem-Vindo à Selva
programme.desc: Um funcionário que é vítima de bullying deve libertar sua besta interior depois que um retiro de equipe na selva dá errado.

programme.title: Um Pobretão na Casa Branca
programme.desc: Quando Washington precisa desesperadamente de um candidato à presidência semanas antes da eleição, não há tempo a perder. Mays Gilliam (Chris Rock), um político desconhecido de um pequeno bairro de D.C., é escolhido para ser a marionete do governo.

programme.title: Antes Só Do Que Mal Acompanhado
programme.desc: Neal só que voltar para Chicago e passar o Dia de Ação de Graças com sua família. Mas ele só se dá mal. Tudo culpa de Del Griffith — um vendedor desbocado que leva Neal a uma busca sem sentido.

programme.title: Algumas Garotas
programme.desc: Na véspera de seu casamento, um escritor de sucesso viaja pelo país para encontrar ex-amantes na tentativa de reparar transgressões de relacionamentos anteriores.

programme.title: Um Dia para Sempre
programme.desc: Uma garota sem sorte no amor precisa evitar que seu amigo se case e cometa um grande erro. O problema é que ela está presa em um loop temporal e toda vez que tem sucesso, tudo começa de novo.

programme.title: Os Estragos de Sábado à Noite
programme.desc: Steve e Doug nunca conseguirão fazer parte da lista de convidados do clube Roxbury. Isso até se envolverem num acidente de carro com seu ídolo e membro do clube, Richard Grieco. Para evitar litígios, Grieco faz amizade com a deslumbrada dupla.

programme.title: Um Sorriso como o Seu
programme.desc: Greg Kinnear interpreta um marido relutante em ter filhos, em uma comédia romântica sobre um casal que tenta conceber um bebê.

programme.title: Solteiros com Filhos
programme.desc: Kristen Wiig, Maya Rudolph e Jon Hamm estrelam ao lado de Jennifer Westfeldt e Adam Scott em uma "comédia inteligente e espirituosa de relacionamento" (Entertainment Weekly) sobre um círculo de amigos cujas vidas mudam quando eles têm filhos.

programme.title: O Seu Jeito de Andar
programme.desc: A "ovelha negra" de uma família rica traz uma jovem ingênua e refugiada para o casamento de seu irmão.

programme.title: Tudo acontece em Elizabethtown
programme.desc: Drew Baylor é designer que, em um belo dia, tem sua vida jogada de pernas para o alto. A caminho de Elizabethtow, Drew conhece Claire. Ela é bonita e decidiu acompanhar Drew em sua jornada de volta para casa.

programme.title: Sexo & Mentiras
programme.desc: Uma exploração a intimidade na vida de dois casais e revela o que é necessário para alcançar uma união de longo prazo, mantendo um relacionamento sexual saudável e satisfatório.

programme.title: Obsessão
programme.desc: Simone herda uma casa de campo e vai até lá com sua família. Seu sonho é renovar a casa, mas à medida que a reconstrução começa, ela cai no caos. Ela deve encontrar seu caminho de volta para os sonhos que a levaram para lá em primeiro lugar.

programme.title: Garotas Inocentes
programme.desc: Duas adolescentes fazem um pacto para perder a virgindade antes de irem para a faculdade, mas se fixam na mesma pessoa, ameaçando sua amizade de longa data.

programme.title: Um Encontro Com o Destino
programme.desc: Depois de saber que ela foi incumbida de cuidar dos filhos de seu primo falecido, um arquiteto fica dividido entre se concentrar em sua carreira e honrar o desejo de seu primo.

programme.title: Amor em Ritmo de Dança
programme.desc: Uma professora de inglês aborrecida com sua própria vida, conhece um campeão de dança, uma conexão instantânea se forma entre eles. Os dois precisam afastar todos os obstáculos para focar seu objetivo: ganhar o título mundial de dança.

programme.title: De Repente o Amor Acontece
programme.desc: Sadie, uma executiva de marketing de sucesso, é filha dos donos de uma tradicional loja de chocolates. Ao decidir passar o Natal com a família, descobre que seus pais planejam vender a loja, colocando em risco seu sonho de um dia herdá-la.

programme.title: O Sequestro do Ônibus 657
programme.desc: Um pai não tem meios para pagar o tratamento médico da filha. Como último recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas dão errado, eles são forçados a sequestrar um ônibus da cidade.

programme.title: Promessas de Guerra
programme.desc: Joshua Connor perdeu seus três filhos na batalha de Galípoli, em 1919. Ele recebe então a ajuda de Ayshe, uma mulher que está à espera do marido, enviado para a guerra, e de seu filho, o pequeno Orhan.

programme.title: O Menino do Pijama Listrado
programme.desc: Uma amizade proibida se forma entre Bruno, o filho de um comandante nazista, e Schmuel, um menino judeu mantido prisioneiro em um campo de concentração.

programme.title: A Grande Guerra
programme.desc: Durante os últimos dias da Primeira Guerra Mundial, um grupo de soldados dos EUA é enviado para trás das linhas inimigas para resgatar um pelotão perdido.

programme.title: Tráfico de Mulheres
